features: Gifts For Kids: Mini projector is a must-have product for kids to watch cartoons and videos, which is very popular with kids. When viewed from a distance with the portable projector, it can project a maximum of 170 inches (Recommended 60-100 inches)Keeping kids away from mobile phones and iPads can protect kids' eyes.

Mini Portable Projector: This Portable projector is designed in small size ( 5.63"*3.78"*2.28"/0.75 lb ). It is small enough to fit in your bag. Therefore, it is rather light and handy to carry when you go out(Support Power Bank Supply). Ideal for home theater projector video in the backyard, hosting parties, and movie nights while traveling.

Super Movie Projector Experience : The video projector upgraded in 2023, support full HD 1920x1080p highest resolution. 1000:1 contrast ratio, A real, dynamic and color vibrant HD projection image quality. It enables excellent playback of films, videos, games, photos, parties, and T-V programs and can be set up at your will.

Multiple Devices Connection: Small movie projector is equipped with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB, audio and other interfaces.It can be easily connected to multiple media devices, such as TV boxes, laptops, desktop computers, digital cameras and iPad,smartphones(When connect with phone, please purchase an extra HDMI adapter).

What You’ll Get: The package including 1 x Mini Portable Projector, 1 x Mini Portable Projector Manual, 1 x remote contorl(Battery not included),1 x power adapter,1 x HDMI cable. woohug small projector provide excellent customer service, any product problem pls feel free to contact us.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 316 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The projector can be understood as a TV or computer monitor. Whether the electronic device (such as phone) can successfully connect to the projector, not controlled by our projector, but controlled by electronic device (such as phone) and to HDMI adapter cable. To connect a mobile phone, a to HDMI adapter is required, we recommend using the original accessories of the mobile phone manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A WOW for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this mini portable projector and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with its performance. This projector is an amazing value for its price. It is incredibly easy to set up, and everything works exactly as advertised.The image quality on this projector is crisp and clear, and it works flawlessly with USB devices and mobile devices. I also had great success using it with a Chromecast stick, which was made even easier by the onboard USB port that I used to power the Chromecast.The only downside to this projector is that the sound quality is not the best. However, it does have a line-out which allows you to connect it to headphones, speakers or sound systems for better audio quality. In addition, it has a tripod mount which is incredibly useful for mobility and placement.One small issue to keep in mind is that this projector does not have a keystone adjustment, which may not be a surprise considering its low price. However, despite this, the picture quality is still great.What's more, this projector is also able to run from a power-bank, although the screen may be slightly dimmer to conserve power. This makes it a great option for outdoor activities such as camping trips.Overall, I have zero complaints about this mini portable projector and am even considering purchasing another one for outdoor use. If you're looking for a budget-friendly projector that delivers excellent image quality and is incredibly easy to use, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kid-Friendly Mini Portable Projector
reviews.reviewText: This Mini Portable Projector is awesome for our kids' movie nights! It's small and easy to use, making movie time at home or on the go super fun. The pictures are super clear and colorful, like a real movie theater. You can easily connect it to our TV or laptop for cartoons and shows. Setting it up is easy, and it comes with everything we need. Our kids love it, and it's a great way to have happy movie moments together! Highly recommended for cool family fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son who is at the US Coast Guard Academy. They are not allowed to have tvs in their rooms so I thought this may come in handy. He hooked it up to his computer and said it was great! I hope he will get lots of use out of in the future. As you can see, the picture was bright without it having to be totally dark in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it!! Well worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this to put on my ceiling since I don’t have a TV in my room. It’s small so it does not take up space and could easily be put away. The picture quality is excellent. I was extremely shocked. It’s easy to connect my phone. it was easy to connect my hard drive, the only reason I gave a four star is because I cannot figure out how to work the Roku stick with it but I am confident I will figure it out. I can’t wait to get the screen so we can watch it outside. I would definitely recommend this product. And the price just adds to it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Can't use phone to connect, good otherwise
reviews.reviewText: One of the main reasons I bought this was to be able to use it while camping where there is no power available. While it is able to maintain power using the USB charging cable via power bank, I have tried multiple ways to connect my phone to it, with no avail. I have bought several different usb-c to hdmi cables, etc, and my phone will not recognize it. I use my laptop instead, which is much less convenient while camping. Otherwise, this is a really solid purchase. Good quality picture and decent sound for a small group of people. The only other issue I've had has been with the remote not working after the first couple times, but the remote isn't necessary to use this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Quality and Easy To Use
reviews.reviewText: I needed a projector to create a wall mural, and I'm glad I was able to find one that was portable, easy to install, and came with various tools to use. It came with a wall charger, a USB chord, a remote control, and a bag to place everything in comfortable for travel and leisure. This projector can show a screen as big as a wall, and I'm please with how clear I can see the images. Overall, this works great with USB Drives and connecting from a computer. For me and my uses, it's been great and simple (I'm a bit old school, but for my needs, this projector is perfect!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Was great for 30 days
reviews.reviewText: Originally this little projector was great, easy to hook up, beautiful clarity, but it was short lived. I had it in use for a little more than 30 days and the video went out. Sound was great but just black lines for picture. Definitely not worth it if this is normal for the usage. This is what we use daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible value for the quality
reviews.reviewText: I am impressed. This little projector is very well built and has everything you need in it for a simple projector.The image quality is 480P, but it looks a little higher resolution than that in my usage of it. The picture is plenary bright when used in a dimly lit room (running on the supplied 12v adapter). Note that image brightness is reduced when using it off of a USB power bank (to be expected).The controls are easy to use on the top of the projector and mimic 90% of the function of the included remote.The playback off of a USB thumb drive is superb. It so far has taken every file type that I have thrown at it and was able to play it back.The speaker is very good for a budget unit.Lastly the focus adjustments are simple to do but there is no keystone adjustment so it will need to be set accordingly to the surface (but keystone or any advanced adjustments is not normally included in a budget unit).I do wish that there was a lens cap included because it has a pretty big lens that can be susceptible to scratches.Overall I was very impressed with this little budget projector. It does everything you expect it to do for a projector of this cost, just a little better. I would recommend it for anyone that needs a simple projector for use with kids or maybe to travel in an RV with.
